devdoc.details: StakeRegistry is a contract to register the staking activity of the platform, along with controlling certain admin privileged parameters

DTokenCreated(address,address,string,str.details: event to log modifications on the staking parameters

LockedValueReturned(address,address,uint.details: event to log modifications on the staking parameters

StakingParametersModified(uint256,uint25.details: event to log modifications on the staking parameters

params.DSLAburnRate: 1. (DSLAburnRate/1000)% of DSLA to be burned after a reward/compensation is paid
params.dslaBurnedByVerification: 5. DSLA burned after every period verification
params.dslaDepositByPeriod: 2. DSLA deposit by period to create SLA
params.dslaUserReward: 4. DSLA rewarded to user calling the period verification

ValueLocked(address,address,uint256).details: event to log modifications on the staking parameters

VerificationRewardDistributed(address,ad.details: event to log a verifiation reward distributed

params.sla: 1. The address of the created service level agreement contract

addAllowedTokens(address).details: only owner can call this function for non-registered tokens

params._tokenAddress: 1. address of the new allowed token

createDToken(string,string,uint8).details: only registered SLA can call this function

distributeVerificationRewards(address,ad.details: only SLARegistry can call this function

lockDSLAValue(address,address,uint256).details: only SLARegistry can call this function

registerStakedSla(address).details: only registered SLA can call this function

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returnLockedValue(address).details: only SLARegistry can call this function

setSLARegistry().details: this function can only be called once

setStakingParameters(uint256,uint256,uin.details: only owner can call this function

slaWasStakedByUser(address,address).details: public view function that returns true if the _owner has staked on _sla

returns._0: bool, true if _sla was staked by _user

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_DSLAburnRate.details: corresponds to the burn rate of DSLA tokens, but divided by 1000 i.e burn percentage = DSLAburnRate/1000 %

_dslaBurnedByVerification.details: DSLA burned after every period verification

_dslaDepositByPeriod.details: DSLA deposit by period to create SLA

_dslaMessengerReward.details: DSLA rewarded to the Messenger creator

_dslaUserReward.details: DSLA rewarded to user calling the period verification

_maxTokenLength.details: max token length for allowedTokens array of Staking contracts

allowedTokens.details: array with the allowed tokens addresses of the StakeRegistry

slaLockedValue.details: (ownerAddress => slaAddress => LockedValue) stores the locked value by the staker

userStakedSlas.details: (userAddress => (SLA address => registered)) with user staked SLAs to get tokenPool

devdoc.title: StakeRegistry

DSLATokenAddress().notice: external view function that returns DSLA token address

addAllowedTokens(address).notice: add a token to ve allowed for staking

createDToken(string,string,uint8).notice: function to create dTokens for staking

distributeVerificationRewards(address,ad.notice: function to distribute verification rewards to verifier

getStakingParameters().notice: external view function that returns staking parameters

isAllowedToken(address).notice: function to check if the token is registered

periodIsVerified(address,uint256).notice: external view function that checks the verification of period

registerStakedSla(address).notice: function to register the sending SLA contract as staked by _owner

returnLockedValue(address).notice: function to return locked tokens back to sla owner

setSLARegistry().notice: function to set the SLARegistry contract address

setStakingParameters(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: external function that sets staking parameters
